content: Well yes, I do have a thing for sticky notes. I am quite particular in the exact ones I want and I use different styles and sizes for different purposes. I am especially fond of the SUPER STICKY Post-Its as they can be moved and re-positioned without losing their stick. Anyway, I like this idea as a way to help my 9 year old foster positive thinking. She is already stuck in the muck and mire of her dad’s way of thinking… .
